extendedInfo.description: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day - Live WallpaperBring the vivid worlds of space, stars and the cosmos to your phone.Features: * Pull daily and random images from NASA (APOD) photo archive * Customize update and pan/zoom speeds * Caches photo to SD card if available * Rate individual photos, which affects the likelihood of a photo being shown again * Link to detail information on photo--  ! Not all phones support live wallpapers, please check for the menu. !TO USE:  * Home->Menu->Wallpapers->Live Wallpapers * Double tap photo to bring up information page

reviews.title: A great app
reviews.comment: I am a enthusiastic stargazer and this app is great it would be better if you could clear up the images so you can see them better but all in all a fantastic app
reviews.author: Jenna-lea Hughes

reviews.title: Poor execution
reviews.comment: Get the free NASA app and choose from any APOD, ever, to set as your wallpaper. You lose the automatic updating but gain in choice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashed Instantly
reviews.comment: As an aspiring stargazer, this sounded like a good idea. However, I was sadly disappointed as this managed to do a number on my Transformer quite nicely, locking it up and wiping everything off the homescreens. Luckily, 2 reboots later I managed to uninstall it and  return the tablet to an operational state. In short, do not touch with bargepole!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force closes on Evo g4 and must pay for the options. Good images when it would decide to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Quite nice, nice and smooth
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It seemed it would have the option of updating once per day the daily image but no luck... O well uninstalled...

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Does not work, don\'t waste your money. Force stop over an over an over.  Awesome pics, does not work
reviews.author: Carl Cahanin

reviews.title: NASA APOD Lite & Pro
reviews.comment: I have used both ver to find that they both have the same probs.  1st I have the pro ver set to load 100 picts & there are too many dups of pics. On the lite version you have no control.  Next the prog is very cranky & can break very easy.  If by chance you change your wp, N.A will stop DLing pics.  With the pro it means you have to wipe & reinstall if you BU it.  You can also try a reboot of the phone & there is no way to redownload.  I like NA but it needs major work! I gave pro 5/5 but now it is a 3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ICS crashes
reviews.comment: Did not work for me in Ice Cream Sandwich... sorry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: You get a new pic most days at 12am est. They store on ur phone till u erase them, & if u tap on the app u can find out all the info on the pic & about space in gereneral, not just for the current but past days as well.
